name: CMTimeMapping
desc: A structure that maps a segment of a source time range to a target time range.

items.name: init(source: CMTimeRange, target: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a time mapping with a source and target time range.

items.name: var source: CMTimeRange
items.desc: A time range on the source timeline.

items.name: var target: CMTimeRange
items.desc: A time range on the target timeline.
